moduleCode:
-- VHDL Configuration
-- Generic While Loop

-- The code inside a while loop is executed until a condition is no longer met.
-- While loops can only be used inside process statements

while_loop_proc: process
begin
	while_loop: while (condition1) loop
	-- exit when (condition2); -- optional
	-- ToDo
	end loop while_loop;
end process while_loop_proc;
